All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddLongController
Controller associated with the computational addition operation between several Long values.
AddLongModel
Model associated with the "Add Long" computational operation.
AddLongView
View associated with the "Add Long" computational operation.
BinaryLongModel
Parent class for all models operating on two Long operands
BinaryModel<T>
Abstract class for computational binary operations on operands of any type.
Calc<T>
Generic calculator.
CalcCommonBase
This class handles all the [CommonBase] elements of the same type.
CalcController<T>
Abstract class describing a global calculator independent of any type of operands.
CalcLong
Calculator dedicated to operations on Long type.
CalcLongController
Calculator controller for Long operations.
CalcLongModel
Calculator model for Long operations.
CalcLongView
Calculator view for Long operations.
CalcModel<T>
Generic calculator model for operands of any type.
CalcView
Generic calculator view for operands of any type.
CommonBase
Parent class of all Model/View/Controller classes.
CommonLongModel
Singleton gathering methods common to all models operating on Long operands.
Controller<T>
Controller independent of operand type.
DivLongController
Controller associated with the computational division operation between several Long values.
DivLongModel
Model associated with the "Div Long" computational operation.
DivLongView
View associated with the "Div Long" computational operation.
MainCalcMVC
Main application
Model<T>
Generic class describing a Model of the tuple [Model/View/Controller].
MulLongController
Controller associated with the computational multiplication operation between several Long values.
MulLongModel
Model associated with the "Mul Long" computational operation.
MulLongView
View associated with the "Mul Long" computational operation.
MyCommand
Interface representing the [Command] design pattern
MyConcreteObservable
This class handles the [PropertyChangeListener] observable.
MyObservable
Interface representing the Observable design pattern
OperandAnnotation
Annotation allowing to distinguish operations with regard to the operand type they manipulate.
OperandType
Defines the different types of operands.
OperationCommon
Singleton used to create operations working on the same operand type
OperationType
Enumeration listing all kinds of operations (computational or not) enabled by the calculators.
OperationTypeException
Exception thrown when an element of the tuple Model/View/Controller has not been found.
PackageIntrospection
Singleton to handle all methods using package introspection.
QuitController
Controller associated with the "Quit" (non-computational) operation.
QuitModel<T>
Model associated with the "Quit" (non-computational) operation.
QuitView
View associated with the "Quit" (non-computational) operation.
SquareLongController
Controller associated with the computational square operation of several Long values.
SquareLongModel
Model associated with the "Square Long" computational operation.
SquareLongView
View associated with the "Square Long" computational operation.
SubLongController
Controller associated with the computational subtraction operation between several Long values.
SubLongModel
Model associated with the "Sub Long" computational operation.
SubLongView
View associated with the "Sub Long" computational operation.
UnaryLongModel
Abstract class for computational unary operations on Long operands.
UnaryModel<T>
Abstract class for computational unary operations on operands of any type.
View
Generic class describing a View of the tuple [Model/View/Controller].
